title: Emerald Polki Kempu Haaram - Regal Radiance
materials: Polki Diamonds (uncut diamonds). Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster and durability.
features: Exquisite geometric arrangement of Polki diamonds and emeralds, creating a stunning diamond-and-gem lattice effect. Features a central pear-shaped emerald pendant framed by Polki diamonds, suspended from a delicate gold chain. The setting allows maximum light reflection, enhancing the brilliance of the stones.
occasions: Special celebrations. A statement piece that complements both traditional silk sarees and contemporary Indian wear.
description: A blend of traditional and modern design, this haaram showcases the finest in South Indian craftsmanship. The vibrant emeralds are carefully selected for their color and clarity. The Polki diamonds add a unique and timeless appeal. A testament to luxury and elegance, it makes a treasured heirloom piece.
